ViewBobX.title: View Bob X Amount
ViewBobX.tooltip: How much the camera bobs from side to side. Set to 0 to disable horizontal bobbing. Recommended: 1

ViewBobY.title: View Bob Y Amount
ViewBobY.tooltip: How much the camera bobs up and down. Set to 0 to disable vertical bobbing. Recommended: 1

ToolBob.title: Tool Bob Amount
ToolBob.tooltip: How much the player's held item bobs. Set to 0 to disable tool bobbing. Recommended: 1

ToolHeightY.title: Dynamic Tool Height Y Amount
ToolHeightY.tooltip: How much the held item moves up/down as the player looks up/down. Recommended: 1

ToolHeightZ.title: Dynamic Tool Height Z Amount
ToolHeightZ.tooltip: How much the held item moves forward/backward as the player looks up/down. Recommended: 1

ToolSway.title: Tool Sway Sensitivity
ToolSway.tooltip: How much tool sway there is for a given mouse input. Set to 0 to disable tool swaying. Recommended: 1

ToolSwaySmoothing.title: Tool Sway Smoothing Amount
ToolSwaySmoothing.tooltip: How smoothly the held item moves back to its normal position. Recommended: 1

DebugLog.title: Enable Debugging Logs
DebugLog.tooltip: Prints logs to the Outer Wilds Mod Manager console for debugging.
